articles.title: Heavy rain forecast in Mumbai till Friday, NDRF deployed; commuters face waterlogging woes
articles.description: The IMD has issued a yellow alert for Mumbai and Thane districts predicting heavy rains at isolated places till Friday. The NDRF has deployed five teams in the city in wake of the heavy rain forecast.
